attributes.action: utterly repudiate the petition asking to bring back public floggings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would take Britain back to the Middle Ages! and would be totally barbaric.  The original petition makes the following points: that locking "yobs" up "hasn't worked" - neither would this as they would simply ensure they weren't found out - and doesn't teach them "core social values"; and public floggings would teach these values?! "They want respect but don't understand it"; in my opinion public floggings would do the reverse of helping them understand it.  And as for "bringing them down a few pegs/giving them a taste of their own medicine" such floggings might achieve that but would hardly civilise them!
